alert.note: Alert for Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 5:04PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Box Elder...southwestern Salt Lake...west central Utah and eastern Tooele Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 504 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Clive to near Dugway English Village. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tooele, Grantsville, Dugway English Village, Stansbury Park, Ophir, Delle, Tooele Army Depot, Clive, Skull Valley, Knolls, Tooele Army Depot South, Utah Test and Training Range South, Bingham Canyon Mine, Dugway Proving Ground Test Range, Great Salt Lake South of the Causeway, Stockton, Rush Valley, Erda and Lake Point. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 40 and 101. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A severe thunderstorm watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for northern and central Utah.
